item.title: Setup Rust Racer with multiple Rust versions
item.description: Guide to setup Rust Racer [code completion utility] with multiple/nightly Rust versions. This will let you navigate & jump to definition between Rust versions. 1) Install Rust version manager https://github.com/sdepold/rsvm#installation 2) Install desired Rust version rsvm install 0.12.0 3) Switch/use desired Rust version rsvm use 0.12.0 4) rsvm - makes symbolic link to current rust version in ls -la $HOME/.rsvm/current total 56K drwxrwxr-x 2 user user 4.
